mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification_info ( userNo, gubun, senderUserNo, message, regDate ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{gubun}, #{senderUserNo}, #{message}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN gubun = 1 THEN 0 END) AS chatCheckCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN gubun = 2 THEN 0 END) AS intstCheckCount FROM notification_info WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND checkYn = 'N'
